org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Class ReconClusterDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.ClusterDriver
        • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.ReconClusterDriver

  • public class ReconClusterDriver
extends ClusterDriver
    This is an implementation of ClusterDriver specialized for the ReconClusterer. It currently implements optional writing of a rejected hit list to the LCSim event.
    See Also:
    ReconClusterer

      • setClustererName

        public void setClustererName(String clustererName)
        Description copied from class: ClusterDriver
        Set the Clusterer by name. This will use a factory method which first tries to use some hard-coded names from the cluster package. As a last resort, it will interpret the name as a canonical class name and try to instantiate it using the Class API.
        Overrides:
        setClustererName in class ClusterDriver
        Parameters:
        clustererName - The name or canonical class name of the Clusterer.

      • setRejectedHitCollectionName

        public void setRejectedHitCollectionName(String rejectedHitCollectionName)
        Set the name of the list of rejected hits. By default, the name is null and so rejected hits will not be written unless this is called.
        Parameters:
        rejectedHitCollectionName - The name of the rejected hit list.

      • setWriteRejectedHitCollection

        public void setWriteRejectedHitCollection(boolean writeRejectedHitCollection)
        This controls whether the rejected hit collection is written out.
        Parameters:
        writeRejectedHitCollection - True to write rejected hit collection.
